General Messenger: "It is important that what we are doing is consistent with other international States".
General Messenger: "We must lead by example. We will ensure all members of armed forces are trained on #sexualviolence"
General Messenger, military champion for women, peace & security and preventing #sexualviolence in conflict discusses @DefenceHQ progress
.@baroness_verma "we will continue to invest in work to better understand what works to prevent violence against women & girls"
.@Baroness_Verma "it is unacceptable that women are still absent from many peace processes despite making up half the population"
.@Baroness_Verma "it is unacceptable that #HumanRights of girls & women are violated as a tactic of conflict"
.@JoyceAnelay: "these are challenging times but we have real momentum. I am optimistic of progress if we are fully joined up"
.@JoyceAnelay: "We will announce a series of ambitious commitments at the High Level Review later this year"
@JoyceAnelay: "the High Level Review provides a unique opportunity for change. We must make the most of this".
.@JoyceAnelay: I want to reassure you that involving women in building peace & protecting survivors will remain central to our work"
@JoyceAnelay: "to achieve ambitious goals at #1325 high level review we need political will & sustainable development around the world"
.@JoyceAnelay: "I am proud of the leading international role the #UK plays on preventing #sexualviolence & women, peace & security agenda
.@JoyceAnelay: "For too long, women have been sidelined and their potential has been ignored. Now is the time to reverse that".
.@joyceanelay: "I am proud to be the Prime Minister's Special Representative on Preventing #sexualviolence in conflict"
Baroness Stern: "Today we'll be hearing from @foreignoffice, @DFID_UK & @DefenceHQ on progress on #sexualviolence & women, peace & security"
Baroness Stern, @JoyceAnelay, @Baroness_Verma & #GeneralMessenger to discuss #UK's commitment on WPS & #sexualviolence in conflict today
